bibl.title: The Textual Character of the Exodus Codex of the Schøyen Collection (MS 187; Ra 866).
bibl.note: P. Coll. privées: P. Schøyen Inv. MS 187 (= LDAB 8121) [edd.: Diletta Minutoli & Rosario Pintaudi, Esodo (IV 16 - VII 21) in un codice di papiro della collezione Martin Schøyen (MS 187), APapyrol 23-24 (2011-2012 [2013]) pp. 17-55, 13 pll. n./bl. et coul.]. - Introduction. - Textual Analysis of the Variants: I. Hexaplaric or Byzantine text?; - II. Variants of MS 187 in comparison to the Old Greek text; - III. Discussion of variants, which could point to pre-hexaplaric corrections; - IV. MS 187 and the texts of the Early Jewish Revisers; - V. MS 187 and the texts from the Judean Desert. - Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Kristin De Troyer, The Textual Character of the Exodus Codex of the Schøyen Collection (MS 187; Ra 866).

P. Coll. privées: P. Schøyen Inv. MS 187 (= LDAB 8121) [edd.: Diletta Minutoli & Rosario Pintaudi, Esodo (IV 16 - VII 21) in un codice di papiro della collezione Martin Schøyen (MS 187), APapyrol 23-24 (2011-2012 [2013]) pp. 17-55, 13 pll. n./bl. et coul.]. - Introduction. - Textual Analysis of the Variants: I. Hexaplaric or Byzantine text?; - II. Variants of MS 187 in comparison to the Old Greek text; - III. Discussion of variants, which could point to pre-hexaplaric corrections; - IV. MS 187 and the texts of the Early Jewish Revisers; - V. MS 187 and the texts from the Judean Desert. - Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
